entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Pangnirtung
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
